text: Five Little Ghosts
Five little ghosts went out one day
As the field that's filled with hay..
Mommy Ghost said oh come on back
But only four little ghosts came back
Four little ghosts went out one day
As the field that's filled with hay..
Mommy Ghost said oh come on back
But only three little ghosts came back
Three  little ghosts went out one day
As the field that's filled with hay..
Mommy Ghost said oh come on back
But only two little ghosts came back
Two little ghosts went out one day
As the field that's filled with hay..
Mommy Ghost said oh come on back
But only one little ghosts came back
One  little ghosts went out one day
As the field that's filled with hay..
Mommy Ghost said oh come on back
But no little ghosts came floating back
No little ghosts went out one day
As the field that's filled with hay..
Daddy Ghost said oh come on back
And all the little ghosts came floating back..
